channel.title: Grafixx Coding -+-╬-T-╬-E-╬-A-╬-M-╬-+- NEED PPL!
channel.description:
╬════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╬ ║ ___ ____ ___ ___ \ / \ / ║ / \ |___| / \ | | | \ / \ / ║ | __ | \ /___\ |__ |__ | / \ / \ ║ \_____| | \ | | | | | / \ / \ ║ ╬════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╬
[size=15pt] WELCOME [/size] [size=15pt] TO [/size] [size=15pt]GRAFIXX'S [/size] [size=15pt] CODE TEAM[/size]
[size=15pt]OUR PEOPLE AND THERE RANKS[/size] [b]1 = new | 2 = member | 3 = 100%trusted |[/b] Coders: -1080 (aka Lee7 Pker) 3 -ianternet 3 -P4PK 2 -N0vamage 2 - _____________________________________________ Hoster -1080 (aka Lee7 Pker) _____________________________________________
That is all i need.. coders, i am the hoster....
[size=12pt]About:[/size] I have been running private servers for about 8 months now, not very long but im pretty experienced. I have made many tuts, as well as helped many people If people know i have ran the server CJscape.no-ip.info, and now running grafixx.no-ip.info Many people are on it constantly which always makes it fun Mage, Range, Melee are all allowed
[size=12pt]What i'm looking for:[/size] I am looking for people kinda like me who enjoey a great server and enjoy coding. I have only came across one person who actually didnt screw me over .... Ian.
But however scince my scource has been takin way to many times when you come up with a good idea i'll give you an older copy of phonescape, which is the server scource i use and you will put it onto your phonescape and compile it and at the end put all that stuff that you added into a notepad and send it over msn. Until i gain your trust it will be done this way for a little thank you
[size=15pt] If you would like to join post in this format[/size]
[code][b]Experience:[/b] [i][/i] [b]Coder length:[/b] [i][/i] [b]Server bases i like:[/b] [i][/i] [b]I enjoy making:[/b] [i][/i][/code]
EXAMPLE!!!! [b]Experience:[/b] [i]i am good at minigames, pking, boundries making npc's, dungeons[/i] [b]Coder length:[/b] [i]I have coded for 7 months[/i] [b]Server bases i like:[/b] [i]Phonescape[/i] [b]I enjoy making:[/b] [i]Npc's[/i]
Note: Npc making is like dungeon... like making a cave full of npc's
